name: Todd Maddox
text: Fresh choice compared to pizza hut or Papa-anti black people kneeling to bring awareness to a legitimate issue-John's.

name: William Fitzpatrick
text: We enjoyed this place. We went because of the coupon we received in the mail. We each ordered a pizza and had a salad. They are skimpy with the toppings but they ask if you want more which is good and bad. If you want more, they only add a ‚Ä¶More

name: Kelli Wheeles
text: We had a buy 1 get 1 offer so we gave it a try. Love that they are environmentally conscious. Interesting drink options. Pizza is made fresh. It was quite good. Caesar salad was ok. Everyone was nice. The place was clean. Plenty of parking. Reasonably priced.

name: Leah Gamerl
text: Went there for the first time. The food was AMAZING!!! I ordered the Art Lovers pizza on regular crust (no alterations) and the Dough Knots. The crew was FAST,  FRIENDLY, and HELPFUL. They made conversation with me and asked questions on my order, on how I wanted it prepared. Great atmosphere! I'll definitely go again, thanks y'all üòÅ

name: Josh Stephens
text: Fun place, delicious pizza, and lots of great options. I really enjoy that I get to add as much delicious gorgonzola cheese as I want. And topping it off with lots of delicious jalape√±os really takes it up a few notches!

name: M Guyer
text: I really liked the assortment of toppings.  Wasn't too keen on the garlic knots (not enough garlic in my opinion) & didn't really care for the burnt taste from the firing, but otherwise will most likely return.

name: Darren Harms
text: Great pizza! The whole family loves it. I love that they have a good veggie selection. The people working there are friendly and outgoing. They got us in with some great coupons but I'm sure it we'll be back often.

name: Trumpetcat1
text: Excellent pizza and excellent service. The staff here are very good at what they do, and it shows in the pizza! Will certainly return for a customized pizza and pesto bread knots.

name: Robin Frazee
text: Delicious wood fired pizza, built assembly line style in front of you.   Industrial inspired decor. Attentive staff.  Adult beverages and cookies available.  The root beer served here is really good. I tried the balsamic drizzle as a finish ‚Ä¶More

name: Scott Chambers
text: This restaurant provides great service and delightful food. One of my favourite spots in the area. The food and drinks arrived rapidly and the rates are fair. Highly recommended.

name: Jabberfoodwocky Mahi & Archie
text: Pizza! Pizza! Pizza! I‚Äôm currently in love with the thin crust wood fire pizzas! They are just amazing and delicious to eat. The day I ate Blaze pizza I knew I would never go back to Dominos or Pizza Hut. They taste so ughhhhh now. Wood ‚Ä¶More

name: David A.C.
text: Super happy with this place. Never been let down yet. Friendly staff. Clean place.

name: Brett Robben
text: We visited Blaze On November 22nd.  The food was mediocre at best.  However, my daughter complained that the milk tasted bad...upon inspection, all of the milk in the cooler was almost 4 weeks expired (milk expired 10/29)!   When we ‚Ä¶More

name: Courtney L
text: Clean restaurant. Very friendly staff. Delicious food!! So glad to have a Blaze Pizza in town finally!

name: Brad Moser
text: Had a great first experience at Blaze pizza. Good prices and large pizzas. Build your own pizza with any toppings. That was pretty rad.

name: Travis Copple
text: Online ordering was simple and straightforward. Pizza was waiting when I got there. The pizza was amazing. I'm glad they finally came here to KC. I remember how awesome it was in Cali two years ago. ‚Ä¶More

name: Ismael Saifan
text: Very tasty pizza. Love that you can customize it as you wish. Put as many or as little toppings as you like. Very nice option for a quick, relaxing meal.

name: Mohammed Ziauddin
text: I came here to order a to-go cauliflower crust pizza. They were out of onions. And we had four separate orders with onion as toppings. I would have expected them to cut onions and offer them as it requires the least effort among all ‚Ä¶More

name: Karen M
text: It‚Äôs a shame that they can‚Äôt get good help here because the pizza is tasty. The staff is so slow and definitely give the vibe that they don‚Äôt care about customer satisfaction. We waited forever for our pizza. We were the only customers in ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael Howell
text: Went to this place for the first time tonight. It was described to me as ‚Äúlike pie-5‚Äù (which I am a fan of) but this place was in a totally different class! Super fresh quality ingredients. Staff was super friendly and the pizza was OFF THE CHARTS!!

name: Mercedes Herrera
text: Food is always great here. It was around 1pm and their line was a bit dirty and the only people that seemed enthusiastic were the cashier and the first guy at the dough station. Love Blaze Pizza, so we drive from the legends area just to get our special orders.

name: Demetrius Marshall
text: GREAT atmosphere, staff, and food!!

name: Laura Miller
text: We had great service and great food at this location tonight.  They had sent out free pizza coupons to the surrounding neighborhood and it was Friday night. So to say that they were slammed would be an understatement. In the midst of the ‚Ä¶More

name: Jonathan Phillips
text: Very disappointed with their pizza. Was looking forward to it with all the positive reviews. Staff was nice and the place looked clean but the pizza just seemed like it was all cheap ingredients and the bottom side of the crust was covered ‚Ä¶More

name: Jason Bashaw
text: Great service, great food!

name: Aurelia Black
text: This little shop is something along the lines of a Taco Bell-quality place. Admittedly, i didn't like the pizza I got; guess I didn't put enough toppings in. My parents, however, loved it. Side effect of having so many toppings, I suppose. ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael C
text: So amazing. The quality is outstanding and they cater to those are gluten free.

name: desertrose129 Kazi

name: Mara Isaac
text: Delicious handcrafted, customized pizzas with a myriad of toppings and crusts to choose from. Pleasant, helpful, patient staff. 5 stars for quality and service!

name: kurt murdock
text: Nice spot for a quick pizza, good quality ingredients

name: Addison
text: Service was very slow. Horrible job listening and could barley hear them. Out of napkins, and the bathroom was dirty.

name: Elizabeth Hollinger

name: Pearce Crew
text: We won‚Äôt be back. Six people in the front, no one could figure out how to help us order the pizza. They just stood around. When finally one gal stepped up, she dropped something on the floor, picked it up, and then proceeded - without ‚Ä¶More

name: Mark Kargol
text: Always a great place to eat. Kids can get exactly what they want

name: Kara Turner
text: Amazing flavor selections. I like to create my own. Cant beat 8.50$ for a pizza to fill you up. Plus the salad and s'mores dessert is fantastic!

name: Elizabeth K
text: Had the chicken pesto pizza and garlic knots.  Very good.  Could only 1/2 of the pizza, so I have lunch tomorrow.

name: John Schick
text: I like traditional pizza (pepperoni & mushroom) but Blaze gives you the best of both traditional pizza as we all healthier (Spinach) toppings.   My daughter and I got different pizzas and both were delicious.

name: NotTheAverageGamerz
text: Not great but not bad either . Pizza does nothing to set itself apart from other pizza resteraunts and kinda bland.

name: Kyle Mayor
text: So I want to give this place 5 stars because the pizza is good and I was able to get cauliflower crust pizza here but I have to hold back the 5th Star for now because of how show it can be sometimes. Not just due to being busy. I have seen ‚Ä¶More

name: Garima Jindal
text: Good make your own pizzas. Options for vegetarians and vegans

name: pmcw007
text: The pizza was very good and the service was EXCELLENT.  The young people working this afternoon were nice and efficient yet took the time to spread ingredients evenly across the pizza and provide customer service above expectations.

name: Emily Majors
text: We come here occassionally when we feel like a quick, fresh pizza. Toppings are many and good quality. We love the fire baked pizza taste. Good value for money. Get the chicken bbq pizza, it's great.

name: L Mont
text: The pizza was ok. Thought it was weird that the crust has black pepper on it. It seems like it takes a long time to bake such a small pizza. Was told to try it but probably won't be returning.

name: Monte Taylor
text: This place was amazing in Las Vegas just as good here - destroying MOD Pizza

name: Sonya J
text: Absolutely love this place! Great food, friendly and knowledgeable staff, and that gluten free crust....oh my goodness! I can‚Äôt get enough of it!!

text: Pizza was great the only that I was not happy was almost every table could use a good cleaning. I really don't like sitting at messy tables

name: Kadie Howell
text: All the employees were so nice and helpful And Cameron was so awsome He makes the best pizzas definitely coming here again!!!

name: Kim Goodness
text: Staff was helpful as you order/move thru the pizza line.  Wonderful unique pizza for a reasonable price.  I will Definitely go again.

name: Paula Palicki
text: Best deal in build your own pizza abd it's delicious. Their blood orange lemonade is so delicious.

name: Deborah Lucas
text: 1st time @ Blaze Pizza! Enjoyed the experience pizza was great we will definitely go back!

name: Ryan Kidder
text: Fast service. Quality ingredients. Great for a quick bite and isn't too pricey.

name: Jason Wislowski
text: Blaze Pizza has hosted a TRULY five star experience every single time I‚Äôve eaten there his far - and they keep me coming back! Firstly, the pizza is excellent! And not just for a fast casual joint; I mean it‚Äôs really, really good. Trust me, ‚Ä¶More

name: Avery Walters
text: Pretty decent pizza. Made to order and quickly cooked.

name: Anna Lickteig
text: I would give them 10 stars if I could!! They all were a great team, one of the girls working said it was the first job she has had that she Can express herself. The general manager was wonderful!! All that and the food was fantastic!!! I will definitely be a regular customer!! GREAT WORK!!

name: Michael Silva
text: Went to this Blaze pizza for the first time tonight, and it was FANTASTIC!!! When we walked in, the assistant manager, greeted us and explained how everything worked. She was incredibly kind and welcoming. Randal made our pizzas and his ‚Ä¶More

name: Nicholas Efkamp
text: Best build your own pizza restaurant. All ingredients fresh, very friendly staff.

name: Scott Cameron
text: The 5 minute pizza places all make super thin pizzas, but I like the toppings at Blaze better than at the other ones and I really like the sauce. The atmosphere is nice and it's a bit trendy. Not bad!

name: Michael Rolfe
text: The crust has only 16 carbs and the fire gives it flavor

name: Alex Lubeck
text: Great pizza, I like this much better than Pie Five. It is similar to Mod Pizza

name: James Carl
text: Killer food an the best staff ever.

name: Arijana J
text: I really liked going to Blaze, but lately the pizzas have a lot of char/ash on the bottom to the point where they're inedible. Please clean the ovens more frequently. Eating char isn't good for your health.

name: Cyndi Miller
text: Always great food and very reasonably priced

name: Eric Carpenter
text: Great for a quick bite.  Pizza was very good.  Will definitely stop in again.

name: Christopher Laubenthal

name: Gary Eastman
text:
Blaze is currently my favorite pizza place in Kansas City. That's high praise, I know.
It's a made to order, assembly line pizza place. It has fresh ingredients that ‚Ä¶More

text: We went on a Sunday evening when they were not very busy.  The girls taking our orders were very nice to us.  One pizza crust had several holes in the middle, but it was used anyway.  The man making pizzas and overseeing everyone was loud ‚Ä¶More

name: Leonard Dale
text: Great crust.  Added ingredients that I wanted. Very good service

name: marcia hurlow
text: The most fun place to eat healthy! The pizza was delicious, with thin and gluten free crusts, lots of veggie toppings and great alternatives to pop/soda drinks, including flavored lemonades and teas. (They also have a few colas and other ‚Ä¶More

name: Jennifer Green
text: Our friends insisted on us visiting here and we were not disappointed. Being vegan I had no problem finding a ton of options to add to my pizza. It was so yummy and I love the drink options. The kids and husband were very happy as well. We agreed we'd be back ASAP.

name: Brian Link
text: Slow service, pizza flavor was kinda bland and just ok.  Doubtful I will be back, other better options.

name: Sheila Shuan Tsau
text: Pretty good pizzas with some unique toppings to choose from. Nice to have unlimited toppings. Staff are usually friendly and attentive.

name: Nick Rodger
text: The keto crust is amazing and is a decent price.

name: Pa Fellows
text: Staff friendly and pizza was good.  Loved got to tell them toppings i wanted only.

name: Ashley Grant
text: My husband I and tried Blaze for the first time and it was delicious! I made my own veggie pizza and he had a bbq chicken pizza and a chocolate chip cookie. Everything was cooked perfectly. The staff was super friendly and we will definitely be returning!

name: Tom Budd
text: Good sized personal pizza and you can pile on as many toppings as you want for the same price.  They don't nickel and dime you to death.

name: Lram 45
text: This place is really good. The price for what you get is probably one of the best. Its a build your own style pizza place that cooks the pizza quickly. The crusts are not the standard pre-made frozen kinds you see at some of the other ‚Ä¶More

name: Ross Campbell
text: Walked in at exactly 8:50 pm on1/9/20 and the 3 female employees told me they were closed. People were still eating in the lobby. Bad customer service- IF YOU CLOSE AT 8:50 THEN POST THOSE HOURS, NOT 9PM. I think the employees were just lazy because it takes 7 minutes to make a pizza.

name: Praneeth Chiguluri
text: Such a great pizza place and excellent customer service. Every one behind the counter were so nice and helpful. This pizza store is very neat too and have a nice patio to enjoy your food.

name: Kayla Beck
text: The pizza was amazing and the customer service was even better. Get some garlic knots!

name: Brian B
text: Really good pizza for a good price.  Factor in coupons and their app and you get a great deal on your next lunch or dinner.

name: Kelley Collins
text: I highly recommend! Several things to like here. I chose a signature pizza called Green Stripe which was delicious and my hubby made his own meatlovers.  He especially love his salad with reduced balsamic dressing. They also offer beer, ‚Ä¶More

name: Small Steps Child Care LLC
text: People were great and the atmosphere was great. Tried keto pizza and it wasn't as good as we had hoped

name: Terry TB
text: we went sunday evening and ordered four pizzas. they were understaffed and had only one guy handling the register and the oven. all four of our pies were over-done and burnt on the bottom. i did not complain because it was not my check. ‚Ä¶More

name: Katrina
text: Sometimes it‚Äôs hit or miss, if you get thick crust it‚Äôs not always cooked all the way but sometimes it is! I still love it regardless

name: Leslie Profit
text: Fast and tasty, food is fresh and good variety of toppings. 1 pizza was enough for 2 kids or 1 adult.  Good drink selection which includes beer and some unusual fruity sodas. Will return again soon.

name: Chad Harper
text: My new favorite pizza place! The crust is the best and I love the toppings. Very nice place and the people were very friendly.

text: Service was fast and the pizza was delicious.

name: Retze Santos
text: Awesome costumizable pizza made to your own liking and there is no limit to the topping s.  Fast and friendly staff.  Reasonable price.  They also claim that the crust is made fresh and not frozen.

name: Katrina McCrummen
text: The pizza is always delicious and there are many options for all food preferences or allergies. They take their time with adding the ingredients on your pizza and are quick to resolve issues, which is much appreciated!

name: Patrick M
text: Fast, friendly, clean environment, the tasty pizza was just a bonus!

name: Ray Pestka
text: Very delicious.  Key:. Be involved with your pizza construction.

text: Pizza was like warm. Had a half and half pizza with clear side differences between the toppings... They still cut it so that to of the slices were half of one and half of the other. Total fail. ‚Ä¶More

name: waylon hoshaw
text: Very great pizza. I prefer it over pie five for the food but not on the pricing. Having an actual brick oven makes a huge difference in pizza flavor.

name: Bethany Andrew

text:
The staff were incredibly nice and understood exactly what I wanted, and the food was actually filling and affordable, something I never got from similar restaurants. I'm literally never going back to Pie 5 so long as I live.
I also highly recommend the blood orange lemonade.

text: Reasonable priced, pint-sized New York style pizza!  Quality sauce and cheese and crust cooked to perfection.  Must try it!

text: I got a mailer for a free pizza and I enjoyed my first experience. The food was tasty, the staff was friendly, and the size of the pizza was generous for the price. I plan to go back soon.
